title: Grimm's Fairy Tales
description: Translated by Edgar Taylor and Marian Edwardes Children's and Household Tales (German: Kinder- und Hausm?rchen) is a collection of German origin fairy tales first published in 1812 by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm, the Brothers Grimm. The collection is commonly known today as Grimms' Fairy Tales ? Excerpted from Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.
author: Jacob Grimm
